// ACTION TYPE SET_USER_FIELD
export var SET_USER_FIELD='SET_USER_FIELD';// ACTION CREATOR setUserField
export var setUserField=function setUserField(value,name){return{type:SET_USER_FIELD,name:name,value:value};};// ==== Action pour modifier l'état des modal
// ACTION TYPE CHANGE_MODAL_STATE
export var CHANGE_MODAL_STATE='CHANGE_MODAL_STATE';// ACTION CREATOR changeModalState
export var changeModalState=function changeModalState(name){return{type:CHANGE_MODAL_STATE,name:name};};// ACTION TYPE LOGIN
export var LOGIN='LOGIN';// ACTION CREATOR login
export var login=function login(){return{type:LOGIN};};// ACTION TYPE LOGOUT
export var LOGOUT='LOGOUT';// ACTION CREATOR logout
export var logout=function logout(){return{type:LOGOUT};};// ACTION TYPE GET_USERS_LIST
export var GET_USERS_LIST='GET_USERS_LIST';// ACTION CREATOR getUsersList
export var getUsersList=function getUsersList(){return{type:GET_USERS_LIST};};// ACTION TYPE SET_USERS_LIST
export var SET_USERS_LIST='SET_USERS_LIST';// ACTION CREATOR setUsersList
export var setUsersList=function setUsersList(usersList){return{type:SET_USERS_LIST,usersList:usersList};};// ACTION TYPE GET_USER
export var GET_USER='GET_USER';// ACTION CREATOR saveUser
export var getUser=function getUser(user){return{type:GET_USER,user:user};};// ACTION TYPE GET_USER_WITH_SLUG
export var GET_USER_WITH_SLUG='GET_USER_WITH_SLUG';// ACTION CREATOR getUserWithSlug
export var getUserWithSlug=function getUserWithSlug(user){return{type:GET_USER_WITH_SLUG,slug:user};};// ACTION TYPE SAVE_USER_WITH_SLUG
export var SAVE_USER_WITH_SLUG='SAVE_USER_WITH_SLUG';// ACTION CREATOR getUserWithSlug
export var saveUserWithSlug=function saveUserWithSlug(user){return{type:SAVE_USER_WITH_SLUG,user:user};};// ACTION TYPE SAVE_USER
export var SAVE_USER='SAVE_USER';// ACTION CREATOR saveUser
export var saveUser=function saveUser(user){return{type:SAVE_USER,user:user};};// ACTION TYPE CREATE_USER
export var CREATE_USER='CREATE_USER';// ACTION CREATOR creatUser
export var creatUser=function creatUser(value,name){return{type:CREATE_USER,name:name,value:value};};// ACTION TYPE UPDATE_PROFILE
export var UPDATE_PROFILE='UPDATE_PROFILE';// Action Creator sendMusic
export var updateProfile=function updateProfile(){return{type:UPDATE_PROFILE};};
